verses.roman:
alarkāt santatis tasmāt
sunītho 'tha niketanaḥ
dharmaketuḥ sutas tasmāt
satyaketur ajāyata

synonyms: alarkāt—from Alarka; santatiḥ—a son known as Santati; tasmāt—from him; sunīthaḥ—Sunītha; atha—from him; niketanaḥ—a son named Niketana; dharmaketuḥ—Dharmaketu; sutaḥ—a son; tasmāt—and from Dharmaketu; satyaketuḥ—Satyaketu; ajāyata—was born.
translation: From Alarka came a son named Santati, and his son was Sunītha. The son of Sunītha was Niketana, the son of Niketana was Dharmaketu, and the son of Dharmaketu was Satyaketu.
